title: Dunkin’ Donuts Flier Fury
subtitle: The owner of a Dunkin' Donuts directed that a memorial flier for a U.S. soldier be 'placed on a dumpster where the rest of our soldiers belong'?
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The owner of a Dunkin’ Donuts store directed that a memorial flier for a U.S. soldier be “placed on a dumpster where the rest of our soldiers belong.”
